name: @r-f-booze/app-booze-db
description: MongoDB database service with automated backups

scripts.restore: ssh root@r-f-booze-droplet 'cd /opt/app-booze-db && export MONGO_USERNAME="${MONGO_USERNAME}" && export MONGO_PASSWORD="${MONGO_PASSWORD}" && ./scripts/restore_mongo_robust.sh'
scripts.restore:verify: ssh root@r-f-booze-droplet 'cd /opt/app-booze-db && export MONGO_USERNAME="${MONGO_USERNAME}" && export MONGO_PASSWORD="${MONGO_PASSWORD}" && ./scripts/restore_mongo_robust.sh --verify'
scripts.backup: ssh root@r-f-booze-droplet 'cd /opt/app-booze-db && export MONGO_USERNAME="${MONGO_USERNAME}" && export MONGO_PASSWORD="${MONGO_PASSWORD}" && ./scripts/backup_mongo.sh'
